channel.title: Semantic on Zhanliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Semantic on Zhanliang Liu

item.title: ⛵ Learning Meaning in Natural Language Processing — The Semantics Mega-Thread
item.description: I found a very worthwhile article while surfing medium.com days ago. The article is a summary of a twitter thread which talked about meaning, semantics, language models, learning Thai and Java, entailment, co-reference — all in one fascinating thread. The original article is here. Following is a copy of the original article: Last week a tweet by Jacob Andreas triggered a huge discussion on Twitter that many people have called the meaning/semantics mega-thread.

item.title: FMR: functional meaning representation
item.description: Element types in FMR Constants: Refer to specific objects in the world. A constant can be a number, a lexical string, or an entity. Classes: Semantic category of entities. For example: location.city, math.number Sub-class: math.number ⊆ math.expression Template classes: classes with one or more parameters, for example: t.list<c, m, n>, where c is a class, m and n are integers. Functions: The major way to form larger language units from smaller ones.
